text: is a former Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Miyama was a member of the Japan national team that won the 2011 World Cup. She was named the Asian Football Confederation (AFC) Women's Player of the Year in 2011.Asian Football Confederation (AFC), AFC Women Player of the Year: Aya Miyama; retrieved 2012-7-25. Miyama was a member of the women's team in the 2008 Summer Olympics at Beijing.Sports Reference.com (SR/Olympics), "Aya Miyama" ; retrieved 2012-8-9.
